72  class NetworkAdapter {
73  public:
74  const std::string& getName() const { return mName; }
75  const std::string& getIpAddress() const { return mIpAddress; }
76 
77  NetworkAdapter( const std::string &name, const std::string &ip )
78  : mName( name ), mIpAddress( ip ) {}
79 
80  private:
81  std::string mName, mIpAddress;
82  };
84  static std::vector<NetworkAdapter> getNetworkAdapters();
86  static std::string getIpAddress();
87 
88  private:
89  enum { HAS_SSE2, HAS_SSE3, HAS_SSE4_1, HAS_SSE4_2, HAS_X86_64, PHYSICAL_CPUS, LOGICAL_CPUS, OS_MAJOR, OS_MINOR, OS_BUGFIX, MULTI_TOUCH, MAX_MULTI_TOUCH_POINTS,
90 #if defined( CINDER_COCOA_TOUCH)
91  IS_IPHONE, IS_IPAD,
92 #endif
93  TOTAL_CACHE_TYPES };
94

97  static std::shared_ptr<System> sInstance;
98 
99  bool mCachedValues[TOTAL_CACHE_TYPES];

108 };

110 inline std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream &outp, const System::NetworkAdapter &adapter )
111 {
112  outp << adapter.getName() << std::string(": IP: ") << adapter.getIpAddress();
113  return outp;
114 }
